# Summary 


```{r DT_summary,out.width = "50%", echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
df <- BuildParamDT()

if (!is.null(df)){
  kable(as.data.frame(df),escape = F)%>% row_spec(0,bold=TRUE,background = grey) %>% 
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c( "bordered","striped"), full_width = F)
}

```
